author: apetrelli
msg: Better management of ComponentContexts inside attributes.

author: davidillsley
msg: Re-enable tests for the kernel module.

author: ehatcher
msg: SOLR-122: Add optional support for libxml2, with fall back to REXML if libxml is not installed. (Contributed by Coda Hale)

author: ehatcher
msg: Make test more lenient, as it seems Solr changed its error reporting format a bit to include
the full stack trace.  Eventually I think the exception message and stack trace should be separated
in the response so a client could pull out just the message easily.
